evidence.claim: RightPatient utilizes AWS Lambda for scalable serverless computing.
The platform adheres to HIPAA regulations for secure health data management.
RightPatient's services integrate with FHIR APIs for health data exchange.
Integration with Azure Active Directory for identity and access management.
RightPatient implements event-driven architecture for real-time patient data processing.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of handling X12 transactions or clearinghouse functionality found.
